record.dc:title: Rosemary Moorehead Scrapbook
record.dc:creator: Moorehead, Rosemary
record.dc:description: This scrapbook was compiled by Pi Beta Phi Rosemary Moorehead, a Decatur, Illinois native and James Milliken University graduate. The scrapbook is dated November 11th, 1936 and is comprised of 118 images. Rosemary Moorehead taught 5th and 6th grades at the Pi Beta Phi Settlement School between the years 1935 and 1937.
record.dc:subject: Students
Education
Expansion and Growth of Pi Beta Phi Settlement School, Gatlinburg, Tennessee, 1928-1943
record.dc:source: Arrowmont School of Arts and Crafts, Archives Collection, Box 73.
